column5: Took along time to get this stuff.  I also got some other rods, lures, fluoro leaders 130#-180# (too much to take pics of).  Thanks to Wayne for the info on Striper Tackle.
GOOD.. now you don't need to borrow mine! LOL  "Striper Tackle" ?? Do they sell that on Vinden St in Midland?
2.5 weesk till you can try7 it out on some pike.....if you don't have to drill a hole!
I got the two bolt on rod holders from striper tackle (mail order).  I hope they work for muskie.  I like that idea bucktail.  Now where can i find some pike that will bend my muskie rod?
They'll work fine Glen... my prop wash holder...
Glad you managed to find something with the handle on the right (left) side Glen!
Geo bay has some fish big enough to put a bend in those rods, try honey or Pointe au Baril......ice is still in as of this morning tho.
Hey Wayne would you know if those mounts would be available for the Lund sport Trak system?  MTP
You'd have to build something Mike !
